name: Source Collaboration Changes Required
description: Notifies the assignee when the administrator requests additional changes to a source that is in review
subject: Changes required to $referenceName source
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

$owner has reviewed your changes to the $referenceName source and has assigned additional changes to you.

Go to the $referenceName configuration page to continue onboarding this source.


Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
